name: room13
description: A thrilling combination of violence, extreme gore, amazing graphics, simple controls, fun and humor. When you find yourself trapped in a mysterious house being overrun by the dead you do what anyone would. Slaughter them, collect their organs, build some guns and kill some bosses.
minimum_requirements: OS: Minimum Windows XP SP3 Operating System. Supports Vista, 7 and 8 Processor: 200 Mhz Pentium processor or higher Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Must support minimum of Direct3D 9 Storage: 40 MB available space
